content.rendered:
EMPOWERING EACH OTHER

Partners & Associates

Kahaani project under Evolve is exhibited by Google arts & culture as a virtual museum.

Evolve curated a digital exhibition of Mahatma Gandhi Philately collection on the occasion of Gandhi Jayanti.

A global advisor for the functionality dialogues, an episode started by them to discuss about exploring solutions for future action. 

Collaborated for a free Canva certified Design Bootcamp for the girls to learn about designs and technology.

Partners for selling Evolve products and also helps in supporting Rural tourism, events organised.

As a women founder was a part of  Rebalance Accelerator’s Inaugural India Cohort.

A member of the Tie community that seeks to engage not only with entrepreneurs but also with policy makers in order to foster the spirit of entrepreneurship.

It is an enterprise connectivity platform developed by Facebook. All the projects are present in the platform as a way to connect with the members.

A member of  the Virtual League of Opportunities (vLoO), a recurring forum organized by Global Chamber where group of talented members with business ideas connect with others with access to funding and other resources.

A member of FICCI Flo and was awarded Achiever’s award and mentioned in the compendium of 100 success stories of women.

A leading Changemaker at ChangemakerXchange Global Community.

It brings together some of the world’s most dedicated young social innovators, activists and changemakers who dedicate their lives to solving a social or environmental problem and have the skills and mindset to collaborate for collective IMPACT.

 

Mentor and a Changemaker for Global Action on Poverty. 

Global Action on Poverty (GAP) accelerates the impact produced by a diverse set of committed, passionate individuals (“Changemakers”), who are tirelessly working to bring people out of poverty through a myriad of ways.

 

Mentoring young adults on choosing Social Entrepreneurship as a career.
